page.title: 08FACILITIES IN WATERLOOVILLE
page.content: The sports facilities are quite good in Waterlooville.Although the nearest swimming pool is in Havant,our nearest tennis courts are at Jubilee Park,which also has a bowling green and a playground for children.Also at Jubilee Park they play football in the winter on the big pitch,and cricket in the summer. The nearest wood is the Queen's Inclosure which is on the main London Road. The nearest cinema is in Havant,and there are no theatres or concert halls in Waterlooville either. We do not have many children's activities going on in Waterlooville,but the shops are quite good and there is a library.There are not many churches in our area. by Nadine Ashton & Anna Evans
